metalign.parsing

Class MidiWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • metalign.parsing.MidiWriter

  • public class MidiWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    A MidiWriter is able to take in MidiNotes and a TimeTracker, and write them out to a valid Midi File.

    This will write out the new file so that any anacrusis is now built into the file. That is, the first measure is extended with rests so that it becomes a full measure.

    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 28 July, 2015

      private TimeTracker timeTracker
      The TimeTracker for this Midi data.
